LanguageData.DigitalStorage_BasicStorage.label: digital storage
LanguageData.DigitalStorage_BasicStorage.description: Unlock the basic digital storage system. Build a storage core to create a remote item storage network.
LanguageData.DigitalStorage_Interface.label: digital storage interface
LanguageData.DigitalStorage_Interface.description: Unlock the storage interface. Colonists within a 3x3 range of the interface can remotely store and retrieve items.
LanguageData.DigitalStorage_TerminalImplant.label: terminal implant
LanguageData.DigitalStorage_TerminalImplant.descripti: Unlock the terminal implant. After implantation, colonists can remotely store and retrieve items from any location, without needing to approach an interface.
